subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements: Statement I: Most of the mass of the atom and all its positive charge are concentrated in a tiny nucleus and the electrons revolve around it, is Rutherford's model. Statement II: An atom is a spherical cloud of positive charges with electrons embedded in it, is a special case of Rutherford's model. In the light of the above statements, choose the most appropriate from the options given below.

options.text: (1) Both statement I and statement II are false
(2) Statement I is false but statement II is true
(3) Statement I is true but statement II is false
(4) Both statement I and statement II are true
